name: Black Friday Sale (JAM_med)
description:
The essence of the game👾 is to collect goods at a discount. Whoever collects the most wins. But not everything is so simple!!! Your goods are stacked in carts. There are more and more carts, and now you have a whole string of them behind you. This tail will greatly interfere with both you and your rivals, which you can use!!!

😮 You can also collect special bonuses. They will allow you to protect yourself, help in collecting goods, and also with the help of them you will be able to set up opponents massively!!!

🪙Collect the most carts and be the winner🪙
